Alcohol 120% - a program designed to create and burn backups of your CD and DVD drives. It also allows you to make an electronic image (images) for recording or running with virtual diskovodov.Alcohol 120% to create 31 virtual drive for playing CD and DVD, work that would not be anything different from working with conventional optical media.

Another feature of the program are customizable modes "wet read" and a powerful system of protection emulation, so you can easily make a copy even reliably copy-protected CD with your favorite computer game, thereby saving expensive original from accidental damage.

Alcohol 120% uses the latest technology and constantly improved and developed, which allows the program to remain a leader in its class. If you have experience in the treatment of CD and DVD discs, it is well know that they can scratch or break, can be lost or stolen. With Alcohol 120%, you can easily create their replicas, protecting its collection.
